task.title: How to Make the Eggs
task.shortdesc: This is what makes the breakfast burrito great!

prereq.p: Make sure that you do not cook the eggs too soon before you are ready to assemble your burrito or they will get cold.
You should have already cooked the bacon, the vegetables, and the black beans.
You should have already cooked the chickpeas and the vegetables.

This is what you will need to make the eggs
Eggs - 2 eggs per burrito
Salt
Pepper
Small glass bowl (In the top cabinet next to the sink)
Small glass bowl
Wisk
Small skillet
Small skillet (In the bottom cabinet next to the fridge)

step.cmd: Crack as many eggs as you want in the bowl. Four is a recommended number just so that you can make more than one burrutio - in case I come home.
Crack as many eggs into the small glass bowl as you need for the number of burritos that you want
This is the place to add lots of cheese if you want it in the burritos.
Season with salt and pepper to your liking.
Wisk the eggs until they are one color and consistency. More bubbles make them fluffier.
Heat the skillet to medium heat and pour in the eggs.
Stir and flip the eggs in the skillet for about 5 minutes, then remove them from heat.

postreq.p: Okay , are you ready to assemble your burrito?
